data.title: Learn Adobe Creative Suite in Denver
data.meta_description: Testimonials of Visual Persuasion providing training classes to learn adobe creative suite software near your location by experienced professionals in Denver.
data.meta_site_name: Denver Adobe Software Classes | Small Classes/Mighty Results
data.text:
After spending thousands of dollars at a university, I am almost embarrassed to say that I learned more in this course than I did in my university courses. The training is hands-on and Marti was well-equipped with assignments and mock projects to ensure that I was held accountable to learn the program. I am taking another course in about a month or so and am really looking forward to it. Visual Persuasion was exactly what I needed and will play a major role in the advancement of my career and any side work that I plan to do. Thank you, Marti!

This was my first introduction to InDesign besides trying to muddle through learning specific functions via YouTube. Marti moved the training at a perfect speed and was clear in all of her instructions. The formatting of the course was an easy way to learn while actually completing projects. I very much appreciated the printed material to take home and potentially practice with! Last but not least, she offers 30 days of free advice in case you are struggling with a project. So thoughtful. It is obvious that Marti loves what she does and it comes across in her class.

I took Photoshop and InDesign classes with Marti earlier this month. I had a great time, learned so much and am super excited to start applying what I learned at work and on personal projects. Both classes had a very small class size which made it easy to ask questions and make sure that I understood the concepts as we moved from section to section. Marti is a patient instructor with a great sense of humor. I'd definitely recommend these courses to anyone who needs an intro or to brush up on things.

I took a custom, one-on-one Photoshop class with Marti, and it was excellent. She is an expert in the material, and was able to tailor the course to my needs and questions on the fly. Prior to the class, I had a working knowledge of InDesign and Illustrator, and needed a crash course in Photoshop for specific job applications. I provided Marti with examples of how I might use the program, and she used our time together to not only address Photoshop basics, but also specific ways that I could apply the tools to the needs I outlined. I left the session with real, practical knowledge that I was almost immediately able to apply in my profession, and my management is thrilled with my new skills. Additionally, not only was Marti knowledgeable, but she was also extremely pleasant to work with -- she was responsive, timely and organized. I can't wait to take additional courses with Marti as the need arises!Paige Jensen 11/21/17 Loved this course. The small group setting was a perfect way to get a good grasp on the illustrator course. Hands on learning has always been my favorite way to learn and the ability to ask questions as they arose was key. Hoping to be back to take another one of Marti's Adobe Creative Suite courses.

Took an InDesign class with instructor Marti Wedewer. I learned so much and Marti was so great! It was very hands on, so easy to get all your questions asked, and her pace and instruction were wonderful. I went in with very minimal InDesign experience and came out feeling confident about my new skill set which I'll use for freelance graphic design. Between Marti, the affordability, the instruction, and the course materials I got to take home (including and InDesign ebook) I highly recommend Visual Persuasion if you're interested in learning more about an Adobe program!

I just took the beginning Photoshop class this week, and it was AMAZING! I was already self-taught in the basics, but I learned so much in just two days! With the small class size, Marti was able to customize the skills she was teaching to make it more relevant to each of us. Plus, it was entirely hands-on, so I was constantly practicing, as I was learning. My job paid for me to take this class, and they will totally get their money's worth out of what I've learned here! Thanks so much, Marti!

I set up an on-site education class with Marti Wedewer to help a small team of employees become more proficient when using Photo Shop for social media and website images. She was terrific! She easily tailored the content of the class to meet our needs. She was able to accommodate a a range of skill levels while being kind and patient. All the participants felt it was fun and time well spent. I highly recommend her!

I have taken two courses with Marti and Visual Persuasion, and have nothing but great things to say. I went in with absolutely no knowledge and came out of my InDesign class ready to make newsletters for my company. Not only is she great with the basics, but teaches you all of the little tricks and short-cuts or "finger dances" as she calls them. She makes sure to cover everything you need and is there after the class as a reference too!

"I must learn the way you were teaching because you didn’t go too fast or too slow. It was also nice to have a small number so I wasn’t embarrassed to ask questions or say when I was stuck. Thank you for teaching this class. This was a great introductory class to get exposed to the tools, see what they do and gain some confidence in working on my own projects.”

"Before taking the InDesign class, I knew very little about Adobe software. But after taking the class, I was able to learn a variety of techniques and skill in a small classroom setting, allowing for individual attention from the instructor. I am now able to assist in projects at work, and even create my own designs. I would definitely recommend the InDesign class taught through Visual Persuasion for anyone who wants to learn, or further their knowledge of the Adobe software.”

"I liked that Wes took the time to instruct each of us differently. Although this was a beginners class the other two people attending were more advanced than I am. They had some Photoshop experience and some Illustrator knowledge. He structured the class so that we all learned something no matter our skill level. I also appreciated his patience and his support.”

"Competitive rates, accommodating schedule, and qualified expert. Marti Wedewer tailored a wonderful full-day training for the marketing director and I to learn specific processes in Photoshop and InDesign. This was for our in-house marketing material needs, and Marti did an excellent job with the pace and amount of information in the workshop.

I feel much more prepared and empowered to do marketing and graphic design materials. Although I have a creative background and enjoy the software available to artists, the Adobe Suite can be daunting to a self-learner. We were shown several shortcuts and many helpful tips, it proves she knows what she's doing. Marti is a great teacher, which also makes your services so valuable for our department and company."

"I really enjoyed the class and learned a ton! There are so many tools and techniques that I didn’t know existed before I took the class. Carma was a great teacher—super patient and helpful. I can’t wait to take more classes at Visual Persuasion. I liked doing the lab after we learned a bunch of tools and techniques, so we could practice on our own, but ask for help as needed."
